=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Flight Of Dragons Review Date: 2019/09/12 Store: Jules Bass (Director), Arthur Rankin Jr. (Director), Victor Buono (Actor), James Gregory (Actor) & 1 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action-Fantasy, Animation', 'Format': 'Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'James Gregory, Victor Buono, Jules Bass, James Earl Jones, John Ritter, Arthur Rankin Jr.', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 36 minutes'} Review Text: This is a movie from my childhood that I have enjoyed and enjoy now that I can watch it again.

Disc works fine. Shipping done in timly manner. Review Title: Movie from childhood. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Steel Magnolias (Special Edition) Review Date: 2019/09/12 Store: Sally Field (Actor), Dolly Parton (Actor), Herbert Ross (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Steel Magnolias (Special Edition).', 'Set Contains:', 'The exclusive documentary is essentially a tribute to the memory of Susan Harling--the diabetic sister of', 'Steel Magnolias', 'playwright-screenwriter Robert Harling--whose death inspired both play and film. Robert Harling\'s comments are warm and welcome, but several primary cast members are absent from the documentary. The "deleted scenes" are not scenes at all, but rather fragments of scenes removed for length and pacing. And while it\'s nice to hear Georges Delerue\'s isolated music score, director Herbert Ross\'s sparse commentary track is a guaranteed cure for insomnia.', '--Jeff Shannon'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Romance', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Special Edition, Color, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Ray Stark, Herbert Ross, Sally Field, Rastar Prods., Inc.; Steel Magnolias Prods., Inc. (a subsidiary of TriStar Pictures, Inc.); TriStar, Julia Roberts, Shirley MacLaine, Daryl Hannah, Olympia Dukakis, Dolly PartonRay Stark, Herbert Ross, Sally Field, Rastar Prods., Inc.; Steel Magnolias Prods., Inc. (a subsidiary of TriStar Pictures, Inc.); TriStar, Julia Roberts, Shirley MacLaine, Daryl Hannah, Olympia Dukakis, Dolly Parton See more', 'Language': 'Portuguese (Dolby Digital 2.0), English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unqualified, Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 58 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.57 x 5.34 x 7.51 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '70247', 'Director': 'Herbert Ross', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Special Edition, Color, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 58 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 25, 2000', 'Actors': 'Sally Field, Dolly Parton, Shirley MacLaine, Julia Roberts, Olympia Dukakis', 'Dubbed': 'Portuguese, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Thai, Georgian', 'Producers': 'Ray Stark', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Love the movie and wanted to have it in my collection. Review Title: Love the movie... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: State Fair Review Date: 2019/09/12 Store: Jeanne Crain (Actor), Dana Andrews (Actor), Walter Lang (Director) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama Product Description: ['NTSC / Region 0 Korean import. Optional Korean subtitles can be turned off from the main menu. The Frake family is getting ready for the Iowa State Fair, each with their own hopes for the trip ("Our State Fair"). Father Abel (Charles Winninger) tends to pig Blue Boy and bets his neighbor Dave Miller (Percy Kilbride) five dollars that the pig will win at the fair, and that the Frake family will all have a good time at the fair with no bad experiences.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.39 x 0.63 inches; 4.09 Ounces', 'Director': 'Walter Lang', 'Run time': '100 minutes', 'Actors': 'Jeanne Crain, Dana Andrews', 'Subtitles': 'English, Korean', 'Country of Origin': 'Korea, Republic of', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Would check this movie out of the library growing up. It holds nostalgia for me. Review Title: Nostalgic Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fried Green Tomatoes Review Date: 2019/09/12 Store: Kathy Bates (Actor), Mary Stuart Masterson (Actor), Jon Avnet (Director) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama Product Description: ['Product Description', "Academy Award-winners Kathy Bates and Jessica Tandy star with Mary Stuart Masterson and Mary-Louise Parker in this inspiring drama adopted from Fannie Flagg's best-selling novel. When an unhappy housewife (Bates) befriends a lady in a nursing home (Tandy) she hears a remarkable tale of laughter, devotion and a special friendship that defies all obstacles in this heart-warming film from acclaimed director Jon Avnet.Bonus Content:", 'Moments of Discovery: The Making of Fried Green Tomatoes', 'Moments of Discovery: The Making of Fried Green Tomatoes', 'Feature Commentary with Director Jon Avnet', 'Feature Commentary with Director Jon Avnet', "Jon Avnet's Director's Notes", "Jon Avnet's Director's Notes", 'Production Photographs', 'Production Photographs', 'Poster Campaign', 'Poster Campaign', "Sipsey's Recipes", "Sipsey's Recipes", 'Production Notes', 'Production Notes', 'Cast and Filmmakers', 'Cast and Filmmakers', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Amazon.com', "Kathy Bates stars as an unhappy wife trying to get her husband's attention in this amusing and moving 1991 screen adaptation of Fannie Flagg's novel", 'Fried Green Tomatoes at the Whistle Stop Cafe', '. After befriending a lonely old woman (Jessica Tandy), Bates hears the story of a lifelong friendship between two other women (Mary Stuary Masterson and Mary-Louise Parker, seen in flashback) who once ran a cafe in town against many personal odds. The tale inspires Bates to take further command over her life, and there director Jon Avnet (', 'Up Close and Personal', "), in his first feature, has fun with the film. Bates develops a real attitude toward her thickheaded spouse at home and some uppity girls in a parking lot, but dignity is generally the key to Avnet's approach with the story's crucial relationships. Tandy is a joy and clearly loves the element of mystery attached to her character, and Masterson and Parker are excellent in the historical sequences.", '--Tom Keogh'] Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, DVD Movie, Blu-ray Movie', 'Format': "Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Collector's Edition, Color, Dolby, NTSC, WidescreenMultiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Collector's Edition, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen See more", 'Contributor': "Macon McCalman, Stan Shaw, Richard Riehle, Gary Basaraba, Jon Avnet, Timothy Scott, Lois Smith, Cicely Tyson, Gailard Sartain, Mary Stuart Masterson, Grace Zabriskie, Afton Smith, Fannie Flagg, Jessica Tandy, Carol Sobieski, Constance Shulman, Mary-Louise Parker, Danny Nelson, Kathy Bates, Chris O'DonnellMacon McCalman, Stan Shaw, Richard Riehle, Gary Basaraba, Jon Avnet, Timothy Scott, Lois Smith, Cicely Tyson, Gailard Sartain, Mary Stuart Masterson, Grace Zabriskie, Afton Smith, Fannie Flagg, Jessica Tandy, Carol Sobieski, Constance Shulman, Mary-Louise Parker, Danny… See more", 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unqualified', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 17 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.38 x 0.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Jon Avnet', 'Media Format': "Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Collector's Edition, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen", 'Run time': '2 hours and 17 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 6, 2007', 'Actors': "Kathy Bates, Mary Stuart Masterson, Mary-Louise Parker, Jessica Tandy, Chris O'Donnell", 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Fannie Flagg, Carol Sobieski', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: A movie my mom liked and wanted to add it to my collection. I enjoy it too. Review Title: Mom liked it... Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual exhibits a strong preference for nostalgic movies primarily from their childhood, favoring titles that evoke emotional connections, particularly those centered around themes of family and friendship. Their consistent high ratings (5.0) indicate a deep appreciation for the quality and emotional resonance of these films, particularly in the drama and romance genres. 

Patterns reveal a strong inclination towards movies with significant narrative depth, often reflecting personal stories and historical relationships. This suggests a preference for character-driven plots enriched with emotional complexity. 

In terms of quality, the individual tends to favor well-regarded titles featuring esteemed actors and directors, often opting for special or collector’s editions that offer enhanced content. Price sensitivity appears low, as there’s no indication of concern for pricing in their reviews, suggesting a willingness to invest in cherished titles for personal satisfaction. 

The overarching trend showcases an individual with a penchant for heartwarming, character-focused narratives, underscored by a strong emotional tie to their film selections, as evidenced by their passionate reviews and the preservation of these films for personal collections.

target_interaction.title: My Mom liked this movie
target_interaction.text: My Mom liked this movie and I wanted my own copy. The disk and case were in excellent condition and didn't realize this is a Hitchcock film.  Not a bad thing.  I enjoy watching now as I did when I was younger.
description: A British gentleman's innocent bride grapples with intrusive reminders of his deceased wife. Directed by Alfred Hitchcock. Oscar for best picture.
